verses.verse: The book <WG976> of the generation <WG1078> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, the son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>, the son <WG5207> of Abraham <WG11>.

Now <WG1161> the birth <WG1083> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> was <WG2258> on this wise <WG3779>: When as <WG1063> his <WG846> mother <WG3384> Mary <WG3137> was espoused <WG3423> to Joseph <WG2501>, before <WG4250> <WG2228> they <WG846> came together <WG4905>, she was found <WG2147> with child <WG1722> <WG1064> <WG2192> of <WG1537> the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>.
